page.title: 18GOBOWEN FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content: The disbandment of{Gobowen Football {Club}due to lack of interest was for one man,{Cyril Mottram,}a bitter disappointment. For those who have been associated with the club for the last 40 years will know that he devoted his life to it as secretary,player,groundsman,trainer and goodness knows what else.You might ask why he did this.The answer is simple.It is because he loves the game and he enjoys helping other people to enjoy themselves. Cyril's one ambition was to win the{Shropshire Junior Cup,}and this he achieved when Gobowen triumphed in the final at the Gay Meadow,Shrewsbury,in the early seventies. He deserves the freedom of Gobowen for his services to young people and his commitment to the community in general. FROM A TRIBUTE IN THE LOCAL NEWS SHEET
